verses.text: \w Great|strong="H1419"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* to be \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add in\add* the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of his \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*.\f + \fr 48.1 \ft for: or, of\f*

\w Beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* for \w situation|strong="H5131"\w*, the \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \add is\add* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \add on\add* the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, the \w city|strong="H7151"\w* of the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w*.
\w God|strong="H0430"\w* is \w known|strong="H3045"\w* in her \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* for a \w refuge|strong="H4869"\w*.
For, lo, the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* were \w assembled|strong="H3259"\w*, they passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.
They \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it, and\add* so they \w marvelled|strong="H8539"\w*; they were \w troubled|strong="H0926"\w*, \add and\add* hasted \w away|strong="H2648"\w*.
\w Fear|strong="H7461"\w* took \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* upon them there, \add and\add* \w pain|strong="H2427"\w*, as of a woman in \w travail|strong="H3205"\w*.
Thou \w breakest|strong="H7665"\w* the \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* of \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w* with an \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*.

As we have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, so have we \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* it \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
We have \w thought|strong="H1819"\w* of thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thy \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.

According to thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, so \add is\add* thy \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* unto the \w ends|strong="H7099"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*.

Let \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, let the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* be \w glad|strong="H1523"\w*, because of thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*.
Walk \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and go round \w about|strong="H5362"\w* her: \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* the \w towers|strong="H4026"\w* thereof.

\w Mark|strong="H7896"\w* ye \w well|strong="H3820"\w* her \w bulwarks|strong="H2430"\w*, \w consider|strong="H6448"\w* her \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w*; that ye may \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* \add it\add* to the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w following|strong="H0314"\w*.\f + \fr 48.13 \ft Markâ€¦: Heb. Set your heart to\f*\f + \fr 48.13 \ft consider: or, raise up\f*

For this \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*: he will be our \w guide|strong="H5090"\w* \add even\add* unto \w death|strong="H4192"\w*.
